description.value:
This fan of soothing winds has six cloud-shaped glass beads on the bottom of the fan, one on each of the exposed ribs. One side of the beads is white, and the other is a dark, stormy gray. Once flipped, a bead stays on its newly exposed side for an entire day before resetting overnight.

Activateâ€”Healing Wind2 (concentrate)

Frequency once per day per bead

Effect You open your fan and turn a bead of your choice. The fan casts a 3-action @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Heal] spell with an area of a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] instead of a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]; the save DC for an undead creature is 34. This spell gains the air trait. The rank of the spell depends on which bead you're turning: the first two beads cast 6th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Heal], the center two cast 5th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Heal], and the last two cast 4td-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Heal].
